abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (A) part of
            RNCFM's 1973-1975 investment plan, including; (i) track
            renewal, the provision of rolling stock and track material,
            and track maintenance equipment; (ii) services of
            consultants to improve the railway's management and
            operational efficiency; and (B) technical assistance to the
            Ministere de l'Amenagement du Territoire on transport
            planning and coordination.
